name: Spring Puzzle Free
description:
Often Spring season is related to new beginnings and resurrection. It is the season of colors, blooming flowers and trees, birth of new life and the end of the cold days. The season brings a lot of joy and holidays all over the world. Some of the symbols of the season are the blooming tulips,hyacinths, crocuses, narcissus, snowdrops, cherry blossoms and so many more colorful flowers that mark the beginning of warmer days. Those are some of the plants that you will find in the gallery of the puzzle, along with some astonishing landscapes. How to play?
Pick a picture from the gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle.
If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle.
As soon as you are done with the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and enjoy the picture on your device.
Kids mode disables the rotation of the pieces and limits the difficulty levels thus turning the puzzle into a simpler and more convenient puzzle game for young players.

The features of our puzzle:
• It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
• Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a cute gallery
• Lots of difficulty levels
• Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
• Game timer.
• Share result/picture.
• Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
• Zoom In / Out.
• Piece rotation.
• Save game.
• Best score statistics.
• Set picture as wallpaper.
• Nice background music.
• Magical sound effects.
• Vibration when pieces merge.
• Kids mode
• Spring puzzle is free.
